abstract: Single-cell transcriptomics offer unprecedented resolution of tissue function at the cellular level, yet studies analyzing healthy adult human small intestine and colon are sparse. Here, we present single-cell transcriptomics covering the duodenum, jejunum, ileum, and ascending, transverse, and descending colon from 3 human beings.
dataset_title: A proximal-to-distal survey of healthy adult human small intestine and colon epithelium by single-cell transcriptomics
